string-array.name: card_defect_desc
string-array.item: Deal 4 damage for each Channeled Orb.
Deal 3 damage.\nAll Claw cards deal 2 additional damage this combat.
Deal 7 damage. Draw 1 card for each unique Orb you have.
Deal 3 damage. If the enemy intends to attack, apply 1 Weak.
Gain 3 Block.\nReturn a card from your discard pile to your hand. Exhaust.
Deal 9 damage.\nPut the next card you play this turn on top of your draw pile.
Evoke your next Orb.\nChannel the Orb that was just Evoked.
Gain Block equal to the number of cards in your discard pile.
Gain 6 Block. Decrease this card\'s Block by 1 this combat.
Deal 15 damage.\nWhenever you play this card, reduce its cost by 1 for this combat.
Deal 6 damage to ALL enemies.\nDraw 1 card.
Gain 2 Energy.\nAdd a Void into your discard pile.
Gain 1 Energy for every 6 cards in your draw pile.
If you have 0 Block, gain 11 Block.
Deal damage equal to 2 times the Frost Channeled this combat to ALL enemies.
Channel 1 Frost for each enemy in combat. Exhaust.
Deal 10 damage to ALL enemies.\nChannel 1 Dark.
Gain 13 Block.\nRetain your hand this turn.
Deal 5 damage. If you have played less than 3 cards this turn, draw 1 card.
Costs 1 less Energy for each Power card played this combat.\nGain 12 Block.
Gain 1 Block. When played, permanently increase this card\'s Block by 2.\nExhaust.
Whenever you play a Power card, draw 1 card.
At the start of your turn, add a random Common card into your hand.
At the start of your turn, trigger the passive ability of your next Orb.
Remove all Block from an enemy.\nDeal 10 damage.
Draw 2 cards.\nAdd a Burn into your discard pile.
Exhaust a card.\nGain Energy equal to its cost.
Look at the top 4 cards of your draw pile. You may discard any of them.
Deal 7 damage to a random enemy 2 times.
Deal 7 damage.\nDraw 3 cards. Discard all cards drawn this way that do not cost 0.
At the end of combat, heal 7 HP.
Whenever you take attack damage, Channel 1 Lightning.
Whenever you play a Power, Channel 1 Lightning.
Deal 24 damage.\nIf this kills the enemy, gain 3 Energy.
Add a random Power to your hand.\nIt costs 0 this turn. Exhaust.
Deal 10 damage. Put all Cost 0 cards from your discard pile into your hand.
This turn, your next 1 Power is played twice.
Gain 4 Focus.\nAt the start of each turn, lose 1 Focus.
Prevent the next 1 time you would lose HP.
At the start of each turn, add a random Power card to your hand.
The first card you play each turn is played twice.\nEthereal.
Lightning now hits ALL enemies.\nChannel 2 Lightning.
Remove ALL of your Orbs, gain 1 Energy and draw 1 card for each Orb removed. Exhaust.
Deal 26 damage to ALL enemies.\nLose 3 Focus.
At the start of your turn, draw 1 additional card.
Evoke your next Orb X times.
Shuffle all of your cards into your draw pile, then draw 4 cards.\nExhaust.
Choose a card from your draw pile and place it into your hand.\nExhaust.
Deal 7 damage to a random enemy for each Lightning Channeled this combat.

string-array.name: card_defect_desc_upgrade
string-array.item: Deal 6 damage for each Channeled Orb.
Deal 5 damage.\nAll Claw cards deal 2 additional damage this combat.
Deal 10 damage. Draw 1 card for each unique Orb you have.
Deal 4 damage. If the enemy intends to attack, apply 2 Weak.
Gain 5 Block.\nReturn a card from your discard pile to your hand.
Deal 12 damage.\nPut the next card you play this turn on top of your draw pile.
Evoke your next Orb.\nChannel the Orb that was just Evoked.
Gain Block equal to the number of cards in your discard pile +3.
Gain 8 Block. Decrease this card\'s Block by 1 this combat.
Deal 20 damage.\nWhenever you play this card, reduce its cost by 1 for this combat.
Deal 9 damage to ALL enemies.\nDraw 1 card.
Gain 3 Energy.\nAdd a Void into your discard pile.
Gain 1 Energy for every 5 cards in your draw pile.
If you have 0 Block, gain 15 Block.
Deal damage equal to 3 times the Frost Channeled this combat to ALL enemies.
Innate.\nChannel 1 Frost for each enemy in combat. Exhaust.
Channel 1 Dark. Trigger the passive ability of all Dark orbs.
Deal 14 damage to ALL enemies.\nChannel 1 Dark.
Gain 16 Block.\nRetain your hand this turn.
Deal 6 damage. If you have played less than 4 cards this turn, draw 1 card.
Costs 1 less Energy for each Power card played this combat.\nGain 16 Block.
Gain 1 Block. When played, permanently increase this card\'s Block by 3.\nExhaust.
Whenever you play a Power card, draw 2 cards.
Innate.\nAt the start of your turn, add a random Common card into your hand.
At the start of your turn, trigger the passive ability of your next Orb 2 times.
Remove all Block from an enemy.\nDeal 14 damage.
Draw 3 cards.\nAdd a Burn into your discard pile.
Exhaust a card.\nGain Energy equal to its cost.
Look at the top 6 cards of your draw pile. You may discard any of them.
Deal 9 damage to a random enemy 2 times.
Deal 9 damage.\nDraw 4 cards. Discard all cards drawn this way that do not cost 0.
At the end of combat, heal 10 HP.
Whenever you take attack damage, Channel 2 Lightning.
Innate.\nWhenever you play a Power, Channel 1 Lightning.
Deal 32 damage.\nIf this kills the enemy, gain 3 Energy.
Add a random Power to your hand.\nIt costs 0 this turn. Exhaust.
Deal 14 damage. Put all Cost 0 cards from your discard pile into your hand.
This turn, your next 2 Powers are played twice.
Gain 5 Focus.\nAt the start of each turn, lose 1 Focus.
Prevent the next 2 times you would lose HP.
At the start of each turn, add a random Power card to your hand.
The first card you play each turn is played twice.
Lightning now hits ALL enemies.\nChannel 3 Lightning.
Evoke ALL of your Orbs, gain 1 Energy and draw 1 card for each Orb evoked. Exhaust.
Deal 34 damage to ALL enemies.\nLose 3 Focus.
Innate.\nAt the start of your turn, draw 1 additional card.
Evoke your next Orb X+1 times.
Shuffle all of your cards into your draw pile, then draw 6 cards.\nExhaust.
Choose 2 cards from your draw pile and place them into your hand.\nExhaust.
Deal 9 damage to a random enemy for each Lightning Channeled this combat.
